授業目的: The objective of the course is for the students to understand the theoretical foundations and practical applications of these foundations in financial reporting.
到達目標: We investigate issues such as (1) role of accounting for corporations, (2) role of managers, shareholders, employees, customers, and other groups in the accounting system, (3) decision usefulness of accounting information, (4) executive compensation, (5) earnings management, and (6) accounting standard-setting process.
関連科目: Accounting for decision making, Business economics, Financial reporting and analysis
授業方法: 1. Face to Face in-class lectures and discussions. In case of needs, switch to Zoom real-time sessions supported by on-demand materials.
